```{r}

aus_accommodation_long <- aus_accommodation |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = Takings:CPI, names_to = "variable",
               values_to = "valor")

aus_accommodation_long |> 
  features(valor,
           list(media = mean,
                desv_std = sd,
                minimo = min,
                maximo = max,
                mediana = median) ) 
```

```{r}

  features(valor, feat_stl)
```

```{r}

  features(valor, features = guerrero)
```
